about_the_game:
Walkthrough document (PDF format) for Twice Reborn: a vampire visual novel.
Requires an external application able to read PDF files.
detailed_description:
Walkthrough document (PDF format) for Twice Reborn: a vampire visual novel.
Requires an external application able to read PDF files.

fullgame.name: Twice Reborn: a vampire visual novel

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux
  • Processor: 1.2 GHz Pentium 4
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX® 9.0c compatible
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX® 9.0c compatible

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X must be 10.7 or newer
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics Driver supporting OpenGL
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1920x1080 resolution recommended

name: Twice Reborn: Walkthrough

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1920x1080 resolution recommended

short_description: Walkthrough document for Twice Reborn: a vampire visual novel.
supported_languages:
English*, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Korean, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
